name: the-forge-marketplace
description: A curated suite for product management and productivity tools to support reasoning, analysis, and creative work.

plugins.name: cognitive-forge
plugins.description: Deep concept evaluation through multi-agent debate (/debate) and interactive guided exploration (/explore). Spawns specialized agents (Challenger, Explorer, Synthesizer) for parallel analysis, or leads iterative dialogue as the Guide with selective agent recruitment.

plugins.name: tasks
plugins.description: Task management with folder-based structure. Each task is an individual markdown file with YAML frontmatter. Syncs with external task trackers (Asana, Linear, Jira, GitHub Issues).

plugins.name: memory
plugins.description: Organizational memory and context management. Two-tier system with CLAUDE.md hot cache and memory/ directory for full knowledge base. Decodes shorthand, acronyms, nicknames, and internal language.

plugins.name: product-forge-local
plugins.description: Local-first product management commands for structured card generation. Automates Initiative, Epic, and Story card creation with local markdown file persistence.

plugins.name: rovo-agent-forge
plugins.description: Interactive builders for Atlassian Rovo agents. Guides through Jira and Confluence agent configuration via adaptive interview and outputs copy-ready sections for Rovo Studio.
